function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupant density fluctuations throughout the working day","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close contact","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, proper ventilation, and regular cleaning protocols","Technologies":"IoT sensors for occupancy tracking, HVAC systems for ventilation","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Overwhelming background noise level in contemporary sealed-façade office buildings","Impact":"Increased stress and reduced productivity for occupants","Mitigation":"Soundproofing, acoustic design, and noise control measures","Technologies":"Acoustic panels, sound-absorbing materials, noise-canceling systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Innovation in pervasive sensor technologies and wireless communication protocols","Impact":"Potential privacy and data security concerns","Mitigation":"Implementing data encryption, data anonymization, and strict access control policies","Technologies":"Data encryption algorithms, secure communication protocols, access control systems","People":"Building occupants, data management personnel","Owner":"Building management"}]}
